bullets: Conducted feasibility research on automated name correction using phonetic algorithms (Soundex, Metaphone) and Levenshtein distance.
Engineered a robust Document OCR pipeline using Python, Tesseract, and OpenCV to automate data extraction from Aadhar, PAN, and Passports.
Achieved 90% accuracy on noisy document images by implementing custom deskewing and binarization preprocessing algorithms.

projects.name: Adaptive Phishing Threat Detection Pipeline
bullets: Built a high-throughput Flask REST API to serve model predictions using serialized classifiers.
Containerized the application and orchestrated deployment on AWS Elastic Beanstalk for auto-scaling.
Processed 10,000+ mock requests with <50ms inference latency and maintained 95% detection accuracy.

projects.name: Diabetic Retinopathy Detection
bullets: Applied Transfer Learning with ResNet50 to achieve high sensitivity on a limited medical dataset.
Implemented robust image augmentation (CLAHE, rotation) to handle class imbalance and lighting variations.
Achieved 92% validation accuracy and reduced false negatives by 15% compared to baseline models.

projects.name: End-To-End MLOps Pipeline
bullets: Integrated DVC for data versioning and MLflow to track experiment metrics across model iterations.
Designed a model-agnostic architecture serving as a reference implementation for rapid prototyping.
Reduced model deployment time by 40% and successfully handled versioning for 5+ concurrent experiments.
